title: Your Portfolio Strategy Shouldn’t Depend On The News
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Pundits are pondering whether the U.S. and China will come to terms on trade and if Theresa May will eke out a Brexit that avoids market chaos. These are interesting questions. But the real question for investors is: Have you positioned your portfolio for both profit and protection – no matter what’s going on in the news? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
